text: He muminagana! Tomadera prati allahara neyamata smarana kara yakhana eka sampradaya tomadera birud'dhe tadera hata prasarita karate ceyechila, atahpara allaha tadera hata tomadera theke nibrta rakhalena. Ara tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara. Allahara upara'i yena muminagana ta'oyakkula kare
